column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm a New York/New Haven Pizza Guy through and through
column3: you have to have one of their deep dish pizzas and while there are no shortages of deep dish pie in the Windy City
column4: Lou Malnati's is definitely the best.  The crust is rich and buttery.  The toppings are rich
column5: plentiful and fresh.  It was so good.  And the service was top notch.  A must-stop whenever I'm there.
